types.name: chore: Changes to the build process or auxiliary tools and libraries such as documentation generation
ci: Change CI configuration files and scripts  (example range: Husky, Eslint, commitizen)
style: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code  (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc)
perf: A code change that improves performance
refactor: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature
build: Compilation and packaging related modifications, such as release version, changes to project construction or external dependencies (such as modifying vite, webpack, etc. configuration)
delete: Delete unnecessary folders or files
